sentences.en: A large subscription began to be raised in the London market.
sentences.cn: 在伦敦市场上筹募大笔款项.

sentences.en: A subscription was got up by the Old Boys to provide the school with a new pavilion.
sentences.cn: 捐款是校友会筹集起来给学校修建音乐厅的.

sentences.en: Fill in the form below and you will be making a saving of £6.60 on a one-year subscription.
sentences.cn: 填写以下表格，全年订阅即可为您节省6.60英镑。

sentences.en: I sent in a request for renewal of my subscription.
I’ve decided not to renew my subscription .
May I beg you for a subscription?
My subscription to the magazine will soon expire, I will renew it.
sentences.cn: 我订阅的杂志快到期了, 我将续订.

sentences.en: Our subscription to the charity fund is ten dollars.
sentences.cn: 我们认捐了十块钱的慈善资金.

sentences.en: Premiere, a subscription channel which began in 1991, shows live football covering the top two divisions.
sentences.cn: 开播于1991年的付费电视频道premiere实况转播两大顶级足球联赛的赛事。

sentences.en: The church’s 120-foot Gothic spire was paid for by public subscription in 1939.
sentences.cn: 这座教堂 120 英尺高的哥特式尖塔是 1939 年由公众捐资建成的。

sentences.en: The magazine subscription expires with the current issue.
sentences.cn: 本期杂志是订阅的最后一期.

sentences.en: They decided to raise money by subscription.
sentences.cn: 他们决定靠募捐的办法来筹集这笔款子.

sentences.en: They decided to raise the money by subscription.
sentences.cn: 他们决定采取募捐的办法来筹集这笔款项.

sentences.en: Voting is weighted by capital subscription.
sentences.cn: 表决权的份量取决于认缴资本额.

sentences.en: We paid a subscription of 5 pounds yearly.
sentences.cn: 我们按年度缴纳5英镑的订阅费.

sentences.en: You can become a member by paying the yearly subscription.
sentences.cn: 支付一年的会员费就可以成为会员。

sentences.en: You may cancel your subscription at any time.

words.tran_cn: 订阅；捐款；认购；赞成；签署
支付额,价格,津贴,捐款,礼物
未赎回的抵押品,总债,贮藏,贡奉

trans.tran_cn: （报刊等的）订阅费，订阅，订购，捐款，（俱乐部的）会员费，捐助
trans.tran_en: an amount of money you pay, usually once a year, to receive copies of a newspaper or magazine, or receive a service, or the act of paying money for this
